XHEADER.Title: Create server snapshot from existing server

SCRIPT.MSCRI:
: INC PCK.AUTOMIC_OPENSTACK.PUB.INCLUDE.ECHO_ON_OFF : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.ATTACH
!-------------------------------------Logging input parameters------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.HEADER.PARAM_VALIDATION : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Compute URL" : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = "&UC4RB_OPS_COMPUTE_URL#" : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Authentication Token" : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = "&UC4RB_OPS_AUTH_TOKEN#" : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Tenant Id" : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = "&UC4RB_OPS_TENANT_ID#" : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Server Id" : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = "&UC4RB_OPS_SERVER_ID#" : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Image Name" : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = "&UC4RB_OPS_IMAGE_NAME#" : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM
!------------------------------------------ Buidling java arguments -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- ! Action name : SET &UC4RB_OPS_ACTION_NAME# = "CREATE_SERVER_SNAPSHOT"
! Define java options and values : DEFINE &UC4RB_OPS_OPTIONS#, string, 12
: SET &UC4RB_OPS_OPTIONS#[1] = "-action" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_OPENSTACK.PUB.INCLUDE.ESCAPE_ARG_VALUE "TEMP_OPTION_VALUE"="&UC4RB_OPS_ACTION_NAME#" : SET &UC4RB_OPS_OPTIONS#[2] = "&UC4RB_OPS_OPTION_VALUE#"
: SET &UC4RB_OPS_OPTIONS#[3] = "-computeurl" : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_OPENSTACK.PUB.INCLUDE.ESCAPE_ARG_VALUE "TEMP_OPTION_VALUE"="&UC4RB_OPS_COMPUTE_URL#" : SET &UC4RB_OPS_OPTIONS#[4] = "&UC4RB_OPS_OPTION_VALUE#"
: SET &UC4RB_OPS_OPTIONS#[5] = "-tokenid" : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_OPENSTACK.PUB.INCLUDE.ESCAPE_ARG_VALUE "TEMP_OPTION_VALUE"="&UC4RB_OPS_AUTH_TOKEN#" : SET &UC4RB_OPS_OPTIONS#[6] = "&UC4RB_OPS_OPTION_VALUE#"
: SET &UC4RB_OPS_OPTIONS#[7] = "-tenantid" : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_OPENSTACK.PUB.INCLUDE.ESCAPE_ARG_VALUE "TEMP_OPTION_VALUE"="&UC4RB_OPS_TENANT_ID#" : SET &UC4RB_OPS_OPTIONS#[8] = "&UC4RB_OPS_OPTION_VALUE#"
: SET &UC4RB_OPS_OPTIONS#[9] = "-serverid" : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_OPENSTACK.PUB.INCLUDE.ESCAPE_ARG_VALUE "TEMP_OPTION_VALUE"="&UC4RB_OPS_SERVER_ID#" : SET &UC4RB_OPS_OPTIONS#[10] = "&UC4RB_OPS_OPTION_VALUE#"
: SET &UC4RB_OPS_OPTIONS#[11] = "-imagename" : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_OPENSTACK.PUB.INCLUDE.ESCAPE_ARG_VALUE "TEMP_OPTION_VALUE"="&UC4RB_OPS_IMAGE_NAME#" : SET &UC4RB_OPS_OPTIONS#[12] = "&UC4RB_OPS_OPTION_VALUE#"
! Build java arguments : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_OPENSTACK.PUB.INCLUDE.BUILD_JAVA_ARGUMENTS
! Setting execution environment : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_OPENSTACK.PUB.INCLUDE.SET_EXEC_ENVIRONMENT
! Invoking java binary java -jar &UC4RB_OPS_PATH_JAR# &UC4RB_OPS_JAVA_ARGUMENTS#
! Status messages :SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_INFO# = "******** CREATE SERVER SNAPSHOT ACTION EXECUTED SUCCESSFULLY ********" :SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_ERROR# = "******** CREATE SERVER SNAPSHOT ACTION FAILED ********"
!------------------------------------------ Error Handling -----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
:INC PCK.AUTOMIC_OPENSTACK.PUB.INCLUDE.CHECK_JOBSTATUS

POST_SCRIPT.OSCRI:
: INC PCK.AUTOMIC_OPENSTACK.PUB.INCLUDE.PUBLISH_AUTH_TOKEN ! Publishing image url in case of success :SET &STATUS# = GET_UC_OBJECT_STATUS(,,"RETCODE")
:IF &STATUS# EQ 0 :SET &HND# = PREP_PROCESS_REPORT("JOBS",, "REP",,"COL=DELIMITER", 'DELIMITER=*::=*') :PROCESS &HND# : SET &KEY# = GET_PROCESS_LINE(&HND#,1) : SET &VALUE# = GET_PROCESS_LINE(&HND#,2) : IF &KEY# <> "" : IF &VALUE# <> "" : IF &KEY# = "UC4RB_OPS_IMAGE_URL" : SET &UC4RB_OPS_IMAGE_URL# = "&VALUE#" : PUBLISH &UC4RB_OPS_IMAGE_URL#,,"TOP" : TERM_PROCESS : ENDIF : ENDIF : ENDIF :ENDPROCESS :CLOSE_PROCESS &HND# :ELSE : PSET &UC4RB_OPS_IMAGE_URL# = "" :ENDIF
